strings.evolution:
So, this is the power I had inside me?
It must be the blood of the guardians.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.description: A soldier defending the Olderion Federation. Bearing a great sense of duty, he is proud of his place as a soldier. He was born into a noble family, coming from the line of the Wardens of the Waters, a group of people who protect others with special powers. His brother was a military tactician and his sister was a priestess, but he chose a different path. He decided he would use his own strength to contribute as much as he could.
strings.fusion:
I will become even stronger.
Not just for my country, but also my family.
strings.summon:
I am a soldier of Olderion.
If I can protect my family,
then I will go with you.

strings.evolution:
I do feel stronger, indeed.
It's strange...but it should come in handy.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.description: A soldier belonging to the Olderion Federation. Despite being of the Wardens of the Waters, he wasn't as intelligent or gifted with magic as his brother and sister were, so he instead trained his body, choosing the path of a soldier. Having once had an inferiority complex he didn't used to get along with his fellow soldiers, but now he has calmed down as a working soldier.
strings.fusion:
You're giving that to me, too...?
I am grateful for your support.
strings.summon:
This isn't my true body...
But if I can be of help
I will go with you.

strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.description: A soldier for the Olderion Federation. Despite having average abilities, he has a competitive spirit and a stronger desire than most to protect others. He is engaged, put given his intense personality she is constantly worried he is pushing himself too far.
strings.fusion:
I can get stronger without working for it?
That's a bit...scary...
strings.summon:
What is this body?
Could it be those legendary...visions?
